rules.description: Change Cmd+Esc to Cmd+`
Cmd+period to `
Ctrl+left square bracket to esc
Control + Spacebar to f19 (Excluded Alacritty)
Control + Option to mission control
Ctrl + x to close safari tab
Control + Delete to delete a word
Control + w to delete a word
Control + u to delete a line
control + command + n to down arrow
control + command + p to up arrow
control + 9 to arrow down
control + 0 to arrow up
Right option + [ to command + shift + [
Right option + ] to command + shift + ]
Ctrl + enter to cmd + h
CMD + Eject key to minimize
Ctrl + cmd + enter to hide other windows
Left control + right shift to command + shift + right square bracket
Left control + left shift + right shift to command + shift + left square bracket
control + command + t to open Alacritty
control + command + h to open Hey
control + command + d to open Dash
control + command + m to open Slack
control + command + f to open Telegram
control + command + s to open Safari
Left shift + Space to Underscore
Disable command q
Map left_option to soft-meta for Alacritty
